title: PyTorch, Docker and AI Openness Highlight AI_dev Europe
author: Joe Fay
description: The AI_dev conference showcases an open model tool and Docker WebGPU support for developers, but PyTorch Rust integration is not on the agenda.
cntitle: PyTorch、Docker 和 AI 开放性成为 AI_dev Europe 的亮点
cndescription: AI_dev 大会展示了面向开发者的开放模型工具和 Docker WebGPU 支持，但 PyTorch Rust 集成不在议程上。
